00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Text;
00025 using System.Xml;
00026 #endregion
00027 
00028 namespace Utilities.FileFormats.RSD
00029 {
00033     public class RSD
00034     {
00035         #region Constructor
00036 
00040         public RSD()
00041         {
00042             APIs = new APIs();
00043         }
00044 
00049         public RSD(string FileContent)
00050         {
00051             try
00052             {
00053                 XmlDocument Document = new XmlDocument();
00054                 Document.LoadXml(FileContent);
00055                 foreach (XmlNode Children in Document.ChildNodes)
00056                 {
00057                     if (Children.Name.Equals("RSD", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00058                     {
00059                         foreach (XmlNode Child in Children.ChildNodes)
00060                         {
00061                             if (Child.Name.Equals("service", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00062                             {
00063                                 foreach (XmlNode ServiceChild in Child.ChildNodes)
00064                                 {
00065                                     if (ServiceChild.Name.Equals("engineName", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00066                                     {
00067                                         EngineName = ServiceChild.InnerText;
00068                                     }
00069                                     else if (ServiceChild.Name.Equals("engineLink", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00070                                     {
00071                                         EngineLink = ServiceChild.InnerText;
00072                                     }
00073                                     else if (ServiceChild.Name.Equals("homePageLink", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00074                                     {
00075                                         HomePageLink = ServiceChild.InnerText;
00076                                     }
00077                                     else if (ServiceChild.Name.Equals("apis", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00078                                     {
00079                                         APIs = new APIs((XmlElement)ServiceChild);
00080                                     }
00081                                 }
00082                             }
00083                         }
00084                     }
00085                 }
00086             }
00087             catch { throw; }
00088         }
00089         #endregion
00090 
00091         #region Public Properties
00092 
00093 
00094 
00095         public string EngineName{get;set;}
00096 
00100         public string EngineLink{get;set;}
00101 
00105         public string HomePageLink{get;set;}
00106 
00110         public APIs APIs{get;set;}
00111 
00112         #endregion
00113 
00114         #region Public Overridden Functions
00115 
00120         public override string ToString()
00121         {
00122             try
00123             {
00124                 StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder("<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\"?><rsd version=\"1.0\"><service><engineName>");
00125                 Builder.Append(EngineName).Append("</engineName><engineLink>").Append(EngineLink).Append("</engineLink><homePageLink>")
00126                     .Append(HomePageLink).Append("</homePageLink>");
00127                 Builder.Append(APIs.ToString());
00128                 Builder.Append("</service></rsd>");
00129                 return Builder.ToString();
00130             }
00131             catch { throw; }
00132         }
00133 
00134         #endregion
00135     }
00136 }
